title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six 3: Gold Edition
notes: The game works, however in menu/planning screen, the mouse is a bit hard to move/odd.

title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® 3 Gold
notes: Runs almost perfectly out of the box. There's a bit of stuttering, but this was experienced in Windows too. Following these instruction helped: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=739436571

Moving the window to another monitor causes some oddness, but found it to be easily remedied by opening and closing the options menu.  This occurs for me at both game launch and mission start (starts on wrong monitor).
title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® 3 Gold
